text: Viktor Hryhorovych Derdo (Ukrainian: Віктор Григорович Дердо, born 12 April 1954 in Berezivka, Odessa Oblast, Ukraine) is a former Ukrainian professional football referee. He is a father of another Ukrainian football referee Oleksandr Derdo. ==External links== * * Viktor Derdo referee profile at allplayers.in.ua Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:People from Berezivka Category:K. D. Ushinsky South Ukrainian National Pedagogical University alumni Category:Ukrainian football referees
title: Viktor Derdo
